greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n - the largest Fibonacci number <= n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1}, While[Fibonacci[k] <= n, k++ ]; Return[n - Fibonacci[k - 1]]]; Table[ f[n], {n, 0, 100} ]
program: (PARI) { k=0; f=0; for (n=0, 1000, while (f <= n, s=f; k++; f=fibonacci(k)); write("b066628.txt", n, " ", n - s) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Mar 14 2010
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Dec 25 2001
ext: Corrected and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 28 2001
